verses.roman:
tabe viśvarūpa ihāṅ pāṭhāila more
mātāke kahio koṭi koṭi namaskāre

synonyms: tabe—then; viśvarūpa—of the name Viśvarūpa; ihāṅ—here; pāṭhāila—sent; more—Me; mātāke kahio—speak to My mother; koṭi koṭi—hundreds and thousands; namaskāre—obeisances.
translation: "Then Viśvarūpa returned Me home and requested, 'Offer thousands and thousands of obeisances unto My mother, Śacīdevī.' "
